attributes.action: Stop uk holiday companies charging extortionately high prices in school holidays
attributes.additional_details:
Families are already under great financial pressure. Please stop uk companies being able to charge upto 500% more in school holiday time for equivalent holidays out of the school holidays.
These in school holiday costs have and continue to get higher and higher as each year passes. While the supply and demand argument is well understood by families the feeling of being so unfairly treated as to be charged 500% more then if they could holiday at other times.
